core_meaning: Conjunction between Neptune and Neptune fuses in intensification. Neptune: . Neptune: . General tenor: mixed; outcome depends on maturity, timing, and context.
risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: intensification).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: intensification).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: intensification).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: intensification).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: intensification).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: intensification).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.
